Name: Picture toys
About the game: 'Picture toys' is an improved version of the traditional puzzle game, Added touch and graffiti features, Also supports creative workshops, Upload and download content from creative workshops, Can share pictures with each other ! Game features Jelly effect Graffiti function Support creative workshop, Can share pictures with each other More than 100 creative workshop items Traditional jigsaw puzzle Can import images, support jpg, png format F key to complete the puzzle quickly Right mouse button automatic touch Touch range R, touch intensity S, touch elasticity E can be adjusted
